Projects

Blockchain-Powered Decentralized DNS

Implemented a decentralized alternative to traditional DNS, removing single points of failure and preventing censorship. Developed smart contracts on Ethereum Sepolia testnet with secure domain mapping and ownership transfer mechanisms.

Tech: Solidity, Ethereum, Remix IDE, MetaMask, Keccak256

Poetry Generation using GPT-Neo

Developed a poetry generation system using transformer-based model. Fine-tuned GPT-Neo on limericks dataset achieving 12.77% improvement over GPT-4 in semantic coherence. Presented research at INCOFT, Pune (2025).

Tech: Python, GPT-Neo, Fine-Tuning, NLP

Placement Preparation Platform

Full-stack web platform for aptitude, coding, and interview preparation. Features secure authentication, interactive UI, and comprehensive preparation modules for students.

Tech: MERN Stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js)

Why Amazon is My Dream Company:
I really like how Amazon uses smart technology to help people all over the world. The company works on big problems and always looks for better ways to do things. I want to be part of Amazon's team and help build smart solutions using algorithms.
